text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in https://nrces.in/ndhm/fhir/r4/CodeSystem/ndhm-task-codes
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/financialtaskcode
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/CodeSystem/task-code

name: TaskCode
title: Task Code
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards
description: This ValueSet contains a set of codes that can be utilized to describe the task involved
